entry.string: Disabled, this will kill the options bar on comments
entry.translation: Deesebled, thees veell keell zee oopshuns ber oon cumments

entry.string: The rendering depth to be used as default.
entry.translation: Zee rendereeng dept tu be-a used es deffoolt.

entry.string: The rendering style to be used as default.
entry.translation: Zee rendereeng style-a tu be-a used es deffoolt.

entry.string: The sorting mode to be used as default.
entry.translation: Zee surteeng mude-a tu be-a used es deffoolt.

entry.string: The sorting order to be used as default.
entry.translation: Zee surteeng oorder tu be-a used es deffoolt.

entry.string: Admin will see the name of who posted.
entry.translation: Edmeen veell see-a zee neme-a ooff vhu pusted. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Allow registered users to post anonymously?
entry.translation: Elloo regeestered users tu pust ununymuoosly?

entry.string: Number of items shown in statistics
entry.translation: Noomber ooff items shoon in steteestics

entry.string: Show the titles of items that the comments are attached to.
entry.translation: Shoo zee teetles ooff items thet zee cumments ere-a etteched tu.

entry.string: Show the item title in statistics
entry.translation: Shoo zee item teetle-a in steteestics
